title: STRUCTURE , OPPORTUNITIES , RESEARCH ISSUES FOR INVESTIGATING BIG IoT DATA
abstract: As Internet of Things (IoT) components are getting multiplied, they generate enormous quantity of data which is to be stored. But such data is not meaningful until it is investigated which needs analytics power. Diverse Big data, IoT, and analytics solutions have empowered individuals to get important understanding into vast information created by IoT objects. But these solutions are still in early stages and the area does not have a exhaustive study. This paper examines research attempts forwarded towards huge IoT data analytics and it also explains relationship between big data Analytics and IoT. Besides, this paper includes esteem by proposing. a new structure for big IoT data analytics. Moreover, types of Big data analytics, strategies, and innovations for mining big data are examined. Various outstanding use cases are additionally exhibited. At long last, open research challenges, for example, security, enormous information mining, representation, and incorporation, are introduced and directed as a future research. Keywords—Intelligent cities, Big data, Internet of Things, data analytics, distributed computing.
